Hello,

I started a crawl with Heritrix 3.1.1, and I noticed some issues wi=
th link extracting.

Files with "strange" names appeared in the mirror dire=
ctory (I use MirrorWriter), such as:
- %2f
- ^https:
- &&S.3f!=3D
- CSS sel=
ector

I think these files have the contents of the file which the link app=
eared in.

I also noticed that links like "?key=3Dsomething1/something2" we=
re skipped, but they are important links.

Can anyone give me some hint on =
how to fix these bugs in Heritrix source code?

Thanks in advance,
Zsolt
